content:
# Factorio Agent Report (Steps 96-103)

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Operational Power Plant at (-9.5, 0.5)
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 0.5) (working, water output)
- Boiler at (-7.0, 1.5) (WORKING, coal maintained)
- Steam engine at (-2.5, 1.5) (WORKING, connected to power network)
- Small electric pole at (-2.5, 3.5) (part of power network)
- Pipe network connecting water supply (status: working)

### Expanded Smelting and Production Complex
- Iron smelting furnace at (5.0, 0.0) (coal maintained, WORKING)
- Copper smelting furnace at (5.0, 4.0) (coal maintained, NO_INGREDIENTS)
- New iron smelting furnace at (10.0, 10.0) (coal maintained, WORKING)
- Gear assembler at (8.5, 0.5) (WORKING, gear production)
- Cable assembler at (8.5, 4.5) (ITEM_INGREDIENT_SHORTAGE)
- New gear assembler at (13.5, 10.5) (WORKING, producing gears)
- Science assembler at (15.5, 5.5) (connection issues)
- Inserters at (6.5, 0.5), (6.5, 4.5), and (11.5, 10.5) (all WORKING)
- Wooden chest at (13.5, 2.5) (empty)

### New Vertical Expansion Area (y=20+)
- Partial construction:
  - Stone furnace at (15.0, 23.0) (WORKING)
  - Stone furnace at (22.0, 25.0) (NO_INGREDIENTS)
  - Assembling machine at (15.5, 26.5) (NO_POWER)
  - Inserters at (15.5, 24.5) (NO_POWER)

### Power Distribution Network
- Expanded small electric pole network
- Now connecting all production buildings except new vertical expansion
- Power gaps in new construction zones

## ERROR TIPS

### Persistent Water Obstruction Issues
- Repeated placement failures near water (steps 96,97,99,102):
  - Implement terrain scanning before placement
  - Create safe distance buffer from water edges
  - Expand search area when water is detected
  - Consider landfill production if available

### Power Network Expansion Problems
- Pole placement failures (steps 96,99):
  - Clear target area completely before placement
  - Verify terrain is buildable (not water or cliffs)
  - Implement systematic power grid expansion pattern
  - Prioritize power infrastructure before production buildings

### New Construction Area Challenges
- Vertical expansion issues (step 103):
  - Complete power backbone before placing machines
  - Verify all new buildings are within power coverage
  - Clear entire construction area before beginning
  - Implement phased expansion approach

### API Usage Errors
- Landfill crafting attempt (step 101):
  - Verify prototype names before crafting
  - Check available recipes in the tech tree
  - Implement error handling for invalid prototypes

### Existing Error Patterns (Still Occurring)
- Placement distance violations
- Partial power coverage
- Ingredient shortages (especially copper)
- Direct machine-to-belt connection attempts
- Incomplete clearing before rebuilding

### General Improvements
- Implement comprehensive pre-placement validation
- Develop systematic expansion protocols
- Create power network monitoring system
- Establish construction staging areas
- Implement material buffer systems
- Develop terrain analysis routines
